Action.author: suryalnvs
Action.body: ~scottz when we use v1.3 based images to launch fabric network, those images will have configtx.yaml with v1_3 capabilities enabled by default. So we are using the v1.3 capabilities when we launch fabric network with v1.3 images. When generating configtx.yaml from NL, v1_3 capabilities should be included and then generate channel artifacts.
